idea:
STILL SOULS is a whole lot more than mindfulness based fun program with profound modern wisdom. We are helping to make future generations happier, healthier & transformation through the practice of mindfulness meditation & mindfulness practicing regular exercise on getting transform life.
In fact we are aiming to reach 10 million young people by end of 2022 with our tools and resources. Half of all mental illness has its onset by the age of 12. Furthermore, 1 in 7 primary, 1 in 4 secondary & 1 in 6 College students, 1 in 10 Corporate Employees suffer from a mental illness every year.
Our evidence based, award winning School/University/Corporate program aims to reverse these trends. Combining mindfulness training, resources and teaching tools to make mindfulness a seamless inclusion in any classroom/workshops/webinars.
We also make mindfulness accessible to as many adults as possible through our seminars and workshops, which offers over 400 free meditations and has so far helped over 0.5 million people’s minds smile. Our premium workplace program is one of the world’s biggest.
What was once the dream of Five passionate founders with a vision to support young people to develop the skills needed to support good mental health throughout their lifetime, is now a leading force globally in positive pre-emptive mental health care.
Follow us on our journey to help every soul thrive & get transform their lives to spread positivity around them.

To deals in digital marketing and innovation related to AI technology.
We are your extended team of experts. We reduce the distance between your business reality and dream. Our team of innovative thinkers, intricately examine your problem statement for creative digital solutions. We are not just an online facilitator. But, we privilege you with diversified strategies and we ensure to choose the best for you.
Some business follows the same journey, but we create a new path for you. Following traditionalism is good, but we adapt to new technology to make a difference.
Your business is known to your surroundings, but we are here to take it to the Universe who awaits you.
Deals in Website Designing, SEO, Content Marketing, Link Building, Local SEO, Competitor Analysis, Monitoring & Reporting, SMO, Influencer Marketing, SEM, Google Adwords, Paid Search Advertising, Remarking & Display, Conversing Monitoring, Online Media Planning & Buying, Creative Management, Traffic Analysis, Campaign Design, Analysis & Optimization, SMM and Many More with AI Technology.


MISSION OF THE ORGANIZATION


In an effort to eradicate corruption happening on local and global platform, I am a serial entrepreneur owning and operating both profit and non-profit organizations. My top- priority project closest to my heart is my NGO, NJ Foundation & STILL SOULS. We work in education, healthcare, wellness-care, agriculture, equality, motivation and stress- management and spiritual development. We currently work with women empowerment in rural India, abortion-prevention, and menstruation-awareness and regulation availability of sanitary napkin in rural India, eradication of human trafficking, currently working in Jammu & Kashmir, love-based, and student-centric education. For more Details, please visit our Website www.StillSouls.com
name: STILL SOULS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
SecurWires Technologies and Services LLP is a PCI SSC Authorized Qualified Security Assessor (QSA) Company and a Member of Data Security Council of India (DSCI) established in Mumbai in Year 2017 with a belief that the businesses requiring Cyber Security and Information Security Services is in need of exceptionally personalized and niche services which are designed around maturing their overall security program. SecurWires is a pure-play Cyber Security and Information Security Company with more than two years of Operational Experience and is dedicated to help businesses run Cyber Security and Information Security Programs more effectively. 


Our highly skilled team of Subject Matter Experts (SME) and thought leaders in Information Security helps clients select the right mix of Security Solutions, Services and Products to execute an Optimal Security Strategy. From Information Security Trainings to Enterprise Architecture and from Information Security Assessments to Cyber Security and Major Initiatives in Governance, Risk and Compliance, we provide a comprehensive suite of services that enables our clients to operate more successfully in an increasingly connected World.


SecurWires is vendor neutral; we do not resell any software or hardware and will always recommend the best solution for the organization. Our professionals provide industry-leading expertise to help organizations meet their evolving information security needs.


Our primary business is PCI DSS Compliance and Security Testing Services (Vulnerability Assessment, Penetration Testing and Application Security etc.) along with Cyber Security (NIST CSF, CIS CSC, SANS Top 20, ISO 27032 etc.), Information Security Consulting (ISO, HIPPA, SOC and SOX etc.), Information and Cyber Security Trainings and Awareness, Risk and Compliance (PCI, ISO, HIPPA and SOX), Custom Security Services (NIST, SANS, FFIEC, CIS, Cyber Essentials, RBI, NESA, IAS, NCRMF etc.), Network Architecture Reviews, Wireless Security, and Risk Assessment.


SecurWires is well positioned to help organizations establish the correct strategies to arm themselves against the ever-growing and ever-present cyber threats and risks.
name: SECURWIRES TECHNOLOGIES AND SERVICES LLP

idea:
In the current scenario of COVID 19 , to be a safe and saving life of all citizen of india is a big challenge
In order to avoid getting infected from deadly Corona Virus , for which keeping personal hygiene and social distancing is the only way out.
In order to safeguard / serve Citizens and to provide them necessary hygiene products at their doorstep in lockdown and in near future too we have initiated to start a new division of Health Care Under Lords Mark Industries Pvt Ltd .
We have tied up with one of the reputed Pharmaceutical company which supply well certified/WHO based instruction health care products like Hand sanitizer Hand Rub, Surface Disinfectant and also we are intend to supply Face mask , Face shield , Hand Gloves to corporates, societies , Airline etc. as much as can we reach on Pan India basis. In future also we willing to tie up with best company in r health care products
name: Lords Mark Industries Pvt Ltd-  Health Care Division
